sentences.en: A governor is the best springboard to the presidency.
sentences.cn: 州长是跃上总统宝座最好的跳板.

sentences.en: Four for men and women each - springboard, synchronized springboard, platform, synchronized platform.
sentences.cn: 男女各4个 —— 单人跳板 、 双人跳板 、 单人跳台和双人跳台.

sentences.en: He dived off the springboard and swam down to the shallow end.
sentences.cn: 他从跳板跳下,潜入水中,游到浅水池边.

sentences.en: He uses other people's ideas as a springboard for his own.
sentences.cn: 他利用他人的想法作为自己的进身之阶.

sentences.en: In 1908, springboard diving was added to the original platform diving event.
sentences.cn: 那年跳板项目出现,成为继最初的跳台跳水之后的新项目.

sentences.en: In the springboard event, men take eleven dives, women take ten dives.
sentences.cn: 跳板项目中, 男子跳11个动作, 女子跳10个动作.

sentences.en: It could provide a springboard to success.
sentences.cn: 这可能是迈向成功的跳板。

sentences.en: The 1981 budget was the springboard for an economic miracle.
sentences.cn: 1981年的预算促成了一场经济奇迹的出现。

sentences.en: The document provided a springboard for a lot of useful discussion.
sentences.cn: 这份文件引发出许多有益的讨论。

sentences.en: The high dive and 3 m springboard are both individual and synchronised events.
sentences.cn: 高台跳水和3米跳板既是个人项目也是双人项目.

sentences.en: The runway is 80 feet long and has a four - foot springboard.
sentences.cn: 跑道长80英尺,并配有4英尺长的跳板.

sentences.en: The springboard has a fulcrum which can be adjusted by the divers.
sentences.cn: 跳板有支架,运动员可以调节.

sentences.en: The springboard is made out of an aluminum extrusion.
There are now some fantastic springboard add - ons for iPhone.
sentences.cn: 有些很不错的苹果桌面增强软件.

sentences.en: Wu Minxia and her partner, Guo Jingjing, won the 3 - meter springboard competition.
sentences.cn: 吴敏霞和搭档郭晶晶赢得了3米板的冠军.

trans.tran_cn: （有助于成功的）跳板，（跳水、体操等体育运动中的）跳板，踏板
trans.tran_en: a strong board for jumping on or off, used when diving (  dive11  ) or doing  gymnastics
